You notice deeper into the cave that there was some type of writing or drawings on the wall as you got closer you saw it was a picture of a human with writing around it, the writing wasn't in any language that you recognize, it looked like a combination of Russian and Chinese lettering. Next to the drawing of the human was what looked like a wolf surrounded by more lettering and next to that picture was what looked like a combination of the human and the wolf, "very odd" you whisper to yourself. You felt a presence to your left, sitting next to you, silently gazing at you with bright blue eyes, was the wolf that you recognize as the one that was draped across your chest earlier. After a brief check you see that the wolf was female, you lower yourself to her height and hold out your hand to let her sniff to show you weren't a threat, but you knew if they saw you as a threat then you wouldn't be in the cave.

The wolf started rubbing up against you affectionately so you reach up and start lightly scratching the wolf just behind the ears. Just then a noise behind you drew you attention, standing on some type of pedestal were two wolves that were overlooking the rest of the wolves below, "must be the head of the pack" you think to yourself. The one that you assumed to be the male let out a noise that was a mix of a howl and a bark, causing the rest of the pack to gather around the pedestal with you in the middle. The two new wolves make their way to the cave floor and when they do the rest of the pack lowers their heads in what you assumed was a sign of respect. You decide the best thing to do is not to upset the pack leaders so you mimic the wolves around you, the alpha male walked over to you and started circling you, examining you from head to toe. You could have sworn you heard the alpha say "hmm" as it checked you out, he let out a grunt and the blue eyed female nudged your arm, so you raised it so it was parallel to the ground, she started tugging on the sleeve in an attempt to show your bare arm.

You decide to help her out and pull the sleeve back the rest of the way, exposing your bare arm, "what are they doing?" you think to yourself. Without warning the Alpha bit down on your arm, causing you to shout out in pain. You raise your other fist and prepare to strike the wolf to free your arm, but another wolf caught your sleeve, preventing you from hitting the alpha. After a painful five minutes, the wolf released your bleeding arm, which you grab with your other free hand, "what did I do to get bit?" you whisper to yourself through clenched teeth......
1511223.title: "What's that in the back of the cave?"

15112231.content:
"Its not something you did, its something I'm giving you" said a new voice, you lift your head and look around, expecting another person to be in the cave with you, but it was just you and the twenty plus wolves. "Who said that?" you ask, "I did" spoke the alpha wolf, "you can talk?" you say in shock, "on the contrary I have been talking the whole time, you just haven't been hearing us" he says. "Us?" you ask confused, "well isn't it obvious who "us" is?" he says, you look around the cave and thats when you noticed all the wolves were smiling at you, especially the blue eyed female. "I've got to get outta here" you whisper to yourself, you stand up and attempt to run out the cave entrance, but as you get to your feet, you vision starts to distort and the room begins to spin making you uneasy on your feet. The last thing you heard before blacking out was the alpha wolf yelling for someone to catch you, when you come to you find yourself on the cave floor with the blue eyed wolf laying on you like a guard dog.

As soon as you opened your eyes she started licking your cheek, you reach up and carefully start petting her, you examine your arm and are relieved to find no bite wound, "some dream" you say. The wolf wrapped its front paws around you and pulled you into a strange human-wolf hug, burying your face in her chest/neck fur, the embrace caught you off guard, but you soon calmed down when you realized she wasn't trying to harm you. You expected her fur to have a musky smell to it because she was a wolf, but it didn't, her fur had a surprisingly clean smell to it and for some reason being wrapped up in her fur made you feel safe and at ease. "You can't really talk can you?" you say to the wolf as you run a hand through her soft fur, "I won't if you don't want me to" was the reply you weren't expecting.

You freeze completely, "so it wasn't a dream" you say quietly, the wolf released you enough so she could look directly at you, "no I'm afraid what you experienced was real" she says. "So what now, you gonna eat me or something?" you ask nervously, the wolf lets out a small laugh, "no nothing like that, we want to .........
15112231.title: The alpha wolf speaks

151122312.content:
"We want you to live with us" says the wolf, "well thank you, but I would really like to get back home" you say nervously, expecting the wolf to become upset with you, but she merely sighs. "I'm afraid you can't return home" she says in a sorrowful voice, "why? you ask confused, "you are the first human in a long time that this pack has seen, but you are not the first human ever to enter these woods, for some reason when a human enters these woods, they cease to exist back in their homeland" she says. "Wait so you're saying that no one knows that I exist?" you ask in shock, the wolf nods, "I'm afraid so" she says, you sit up and the wolf climbs off you. You hold your head in your hands, trying to understand whats happening and what to do now, you feel the wolfs muzzle nudge your chin. "Are you ok human?" she asks, you look up and see she was staring at you with her blue eyes, studying you, you reach out and pet the side of her head, "I will be, its just this is a lot to take in at once" you say with a weak smile.

The wolf rolls over on her back, draping herself across you legs like a dog, "well you know I'm--er...we are here for you" she says. You look around the cave and thats when you noticed the whole cave of wolves was either staring at you or quietly whispering amongst themselves. At first you thought they were afraid of you, but you soon realize they seemed to be curious about you and were working up the strength to come talk to you. "You see, we have accepted you as a member of this pack, we are offering you a new home" said the wolf, rolling over and sitting next to your legs, "do I have a choice?" you ask, "well if you don't want to stay, we won't keep you against your will and we will return your belongings" said the wolf as another wolf walked forward, dragging your confiscated gear behind him. "But if you chose to leave, we cannot help you outside the cave, but if you change your mind and wish to return to us, we will be here" spoke a different voice, you look up and recognize the voice as belonging to the alpha wolf that bit you earlier. He walked over to you and stood at your feet, "I leave the choice up to you if you want to stay or leave" he says.
151122312.title: "Live with us"

1511223121.content:
As you sit there thinking of your final decision, you notice the wolves started gathering around you, awaiting your answer, you finally look at the alpha and give him your answer, "I'll stay" you say to him, suddenly you get tackled by all 20+ wolves. At first you thought they were mad at you for some unknown reason, but then you realized they weren't mad at you, they were overjoyed that you decided to stay. You still had to fight the off as they were all trying to lick you at once, but that proved impossible to fend off that many, so you give up and let them continue, finally after a nice long wolf tongue bath, they stop and drape themselves across you again. The alpha wolf walks over to your exposed head and proceeded to give you a couple licks across the face, "welcome to the pack human" he says before walking off to do whatever.

One by one the wolves fall asleep on you, entrapping you underneath their furry bodies, you free a hand and start petting the nearest wolf. After a few minutes of laying down you decide to take a small nap, "not like I'm going anywhere soon" you say to yourself. When you open your eyes after a good nap you find the blue eyed wolf laying on you, watching you, "sleep well ?" she asks, "surprisingly I did" you say, amazed that your back didn't hurt from laying on the hard rock floor. "Good because..........."
1511223121.title: Stay

15113.content:
You are suddenly awoken for no apparent reason, you look around the cave and see it was really early in the morning as the sun was just beginning to rise, You yawn and stretch, suddenly you notice strands of fur on your chest and arms of your shirt, you shine a light around the cave and see no sign of footprints entering or leaving the cave. You recover your gear and leave the cave, walking in the same direction from yesterday, every so often you get the feeling of being watched, but when you look behind you there was nothing.

As you continue walking you hear something in the bushes next to you making you increase your walking pace yo a small jog. As you continue moving through the forest you hear something following you through the bushes next to you. As you increase you pace, whatever was following you seemed to be doing the same, next thing you know you're running and whatever was following you was now chasing you. As you run through the forest you spot another cave so you make your way over to it hoping whatever was following you doesn't follow you in.

As you run into the cave you see something that makes you stop, standing in the entrace to the cave was..........
15113.title: You wake up and se signs that something was there

151131.content:
As you approach the cave you see standing there was a gray wolf, and what shocked you the most was that the wolf had human qualities, human-like paws, standing on two feet and long black hair coming out of her head. As you got closer, it turned around, revealing it to be female. The female wolf saw you and looked you up and down with glowing blue eyes, suddenly eight gray tails appeared behind her, you raised your rifle based on what your instincts were telling you, but you had it pointed at the ground near her feet.

"I mean you no harm" she says in a smooth, calm voice making you lower your rifle a little, "who are you?" you ask. "My name is Anna" she said, she gestures with her hand toward you, "oh my name's Christopher" you say, "well Christopher come inside and lets talk" she says waving you forward. You follow her cautiously into the cave, still unsure about her, "well Christopher you're the first human I've seen in a long time" she says as you enter the cave. Inside the cave didn't look like your normal cave, in the center was a fire pit and sitting area carved out of the floor, on either side of the pit were two makeshift beds.

"You can set your things down here" says Anna pointing next to the pit, you drop your bag, vest, and rifle but keep your sidearm at the ready. "I couldn't help but notice there are two beds" you say, Anna nods, "yeah one's mine and the other's.......
151131.title: Wolf-Kitsune hybrid

1511312.content:
"That one's my friend's bed, and judging from the hairs on you, you've already met her" Anna says, "what?" you say confused. "Here follow me" she says waving back outside, as the two of you walk outside she points to a set of bushes nearby. You look at her confused, but she continues to point at the bushes, slowly you walk toward the bushes and examine them closely. Suddenly some type of large, female, feline jumps out at you, you only had enough time to bring up your hands for protection before she tackled you to the ground. You bring your arms up to your face and prepare yourself for the pain of claws and teeth digging into your flesh, but none came.

"Huh?" you say to yourself as you drop your arms, wrapped around your chest in a hug was the feline that jumped out at you. The feline looked to be a mix of a cheetah and a leopard with light brown hair coming out of her head, "yeah sorry about that Michelle is a little clingy" says Anna. You look at the large cat draped on you, she had her eyes closed and was purring lightly on your chest, Anna walked over and lightly petted Michelle on the head, "Michelle I think its time you let our guest up" she said. Michelle let out a light groan before letting you go, as you get to your feet Anna walks up behind you and brushes you off, "hey you're that human I found last night" says Michelle.

"So that was your fur on me this morning?" you ask, "well when I found you, you were shivering in the cold so I used my fur to keep you warm through the night" says Michelle. "Come I was just about to make breakfast, we can talk over food" says Anna.
1511312.title: "My friend's"

choices: Try to make your way back to the helicopter
1512.content:
You look out the side door at the vast jungle below, "kind of looks like Vietnam down there huh?' says one of the pilots. You laugh, it really did feel like you were flying over Vietnam, you were even riding in a helicopter from that time period a, UH-1 Huey. "Yeah all thats missing is the music" joked the co-pilot, suddenly the Huey shook violently for a few seconds and then settled down, "everything ok up there?" you ask concerned. "Just some turbulence" says the pilot, you've experienced turbulence before and this was not turbulence, you look into the cockpit and it looked like the two pilots were wrestling with the controls, you notice the altimeter start to rapidly count down. Which you knew meant one thing: the helicopter was crashing, the last thing you remember before being knocked out was the pilot yelling to hold on and the sound of the first tree branches striking the hull.

You regain consciousness, as you look out you see that the helicopter was suspended by a combination of two trees and some vines, as you look down you see it was suspended across a fast flowing river below. "Good you're awake, get over here and free us" says the pilot, you look forward and see that he and the co-pilot were stuck in their seats, you step forward and suddenly the helicopter started to roll to the left, but stopped, "easy, you don't want to roll us into the river or we'll really be in trouble" says the co-pilot. You nod and slowly move toward the cockpit, just as you make it half way, the helicopter completely rolls to its left causing you to slide and crash into the closed, left side door. Luckily for you neither the door or helicopter fall into the river, you laugh and look at the pilot, "that was clo---" before you could finish the door that you were laying on broke off and sent you falling into the rapid river below.

You fight your way to the surface and the last thing you saw was the river carrying you away from the helicopter before you get sucked back under by the current. You again fight your way back to the surface and find the broken door floating next to you so you quickly grab onto it to keep yourself from going back under. You lay across the door tired from having to fight the current twice to stay afloat, after floating down river for what seemed like an hour the river starts to become calmer, you look over and see some type of beachhead. You swim your way over still using the door to float on in case the current trie to suck you under again, you climb onto the solid ground and lay there for a few seconds as you look back up river you can no longer see the downed Huey.

You check yourself for any injuries and find non, you check your gear to see if anything was broken, surprisingly you sit had your rifle and all your other gear. "Ok what to do now?" you ask yourself..........
1512.title: Jungle

15122.content:
You decide that the best thing to do right now is to follow the river and locate the crashed Huey and the two pilots. You grab your gear and walk in the opposite direction of the river's flow, every so often you hear something moving in the near by vegetation, followed by the feeling of being watched. You continue walking alongside the river for a over four hour and see no signs of getting close to the helicopter. As you walk around a bend in the river you see something that makes your heart sink, the Huey was nose down in the river. As fast as possible you run over and get as close to the helicopter as you can, not wanting to be sucked away in the current again.

You can see in to the cockpit, but the two pilots weren't there, which in a way was good news because if the pilots had been carried away in the current you would have seen them. Unfortunately there was no sign of which way they might have gone, but you look around anyways. After searching around for an hour you were about to give up when you saw a pair of boot prints leading into the jungle with a set of animal prints and in the middle were drag marks like someone was being dragged.

You walking into jungle following the prints, you follow them for about a mile before losing them near a smaller river. You look around when suddenly.........
15122.title: Try to make your way back to the helicopter

choices: Let her finish and then go talk to her
151221.content:
You stop and listen, "was that singing?" you ask yourself, seconds later you hear it again, it was a beautiful voice that was clearly female, but they were singing in a language that you've never heard before. It sounded like a combination of Spanish, Russian, and maybe Latin, as you listen you judge that the sining or chanting was fairly close by, Slowly you walk in the direction of the singing, you finally reach the source of the singing, slowly and carefully you pull away the vegetation to reveal something that left you staring in a state of shock, fear, and awe. In front of you was a large pond or river with clear water flowing through it, in the center of this pond was a few large boulders and on one of these boulders was a human-like animal with blue and white fur with its back to you.

Slowly you move to get a better look at this strange creature, as you neared you could see that the creature had fox-like features, pointed ears and a bushy tail from where you were you could tell the creature was clearly female. You stop and sit, watching as the creature began to sing again, but as she sang she seemed to levitate in the air above the boulder. You noticed the water around her start to act strangely, like someone had switched off the gravity and it started to float in the air in different sized globs. As she continued to rise into the air you noticed some type of energy radiating around her, as you sit there watching you want to try talking to her, but you don't know if you should interrupt whatever she was doing.
151221.title: You hear.....singing??

choices: You find yourself in some type of bed
1512212.content:
As much as you like hearing the singing you still have to find a way out of this jungle and she's your best bet right now. You make your way to the edge of the pond behind the fox figure, "um excuse me" you yell to the floating figure. She spins around and looks at you with glowing, green eyes that radiated the same energy that her body was radiating. She looked you over, but as her eyes see your rifle they change color to a glowing amber color, making you take a step back. "Maybe this wasn't a good idea" you say to yourself, the figure continues looking you over, she seemed fixated on the weapons on your persons, your bayonet, sidearm, and grenades.

Her eyes change colors again, but this time to a glowing red color making you feel a shiver of fear creep down your spine. "Uh oh" you say, you turn to run, but you find that you can't as you are lifted into the air and rotated so that you are facing the fox figure. She says something in that strange language, but this time instead of singing, she says it in a neutral voice, completely devoid of emotion. "Listen I don't know what you're saying, I was wondering if you could help me get out of here" you say with your hands raised. She says something again and this time is sounded like she was asking a question, you adjust the rifle sling that was across your chest, but she must have thought you were doing to harm her, because next thing you knew she was shouting at you in that strange language.

You notice the energy in her eyes radiate more making it look like her eyes were on fire, "no no no wait hang o----" before you could say anything else you find yourself being launched backwards through the air. You go crashing into at least five trees before coming to a painful stop on a patch of dirt, you roll over and spit out a mouthful of blood, surprisingly no teeth. You inhale and you can tell you have at least three broken ribs and judging from the pain in your hands you have two broken fingers, and one finger jammed, your left shoulder was dislocated, and there was a sharp pain in your right leg. You look up and see the fox figure float back down onto the boulder, you attempt to stand to get away from her, but you fall back down when you try to put weight on your right leg.

You grab your leg and thats when you could tell it was broken too, you look at the fox again and you see she was walking across the water like she was walking across solid ground. As soon as she made it to land she ran over to you, with your right hand you draw your sidearm and aim at her, because your pointer finger was broken you would have to use your middle finger to pull the trigger. "Please no more" you beg, but as she got close you saw her eyes no longer had the glowing energy in them and her face showed emotion, something that it didn't have 30 seconds ago. "I'm so sorry are you ok?" she says in perfect English, you must have hit your head when you got thrown because before you could say anything, everything was getting dark and you began to pass out.
1512212.title: This is important, interrupt

15122122.content:
You open your eyes and find yourself in a semi-dark room laying on some type of furry pelts. You check yourself and find that all your injuries were gone, almost like they never happened, but all your stuff was gone, the only things you still had was your pants and boots. You see light flood the room as a door is opened, standing in the door way was a figure that you recognize as the fox from earlier. You strike a defensive posture with your fists raised, but you become light headed and start to collapse. Before you fall to the floor the figure ran over and caught you, her furry hands felt soft on your bare chest, "easy I'm sorry about earlier, but I'm not going to hurt you now" she says. She helps you back onto the bed, "why am I feeling this way?" you ask, "long story short, I rapidly healed you and it probably made your body tired so you need to rest" she says.

The fox lays you down on the fur pelt bed, she runs a hand across your face, like your chest, her furry hand felt nice against your bare skin. She stops and gets up to leave, but you stop her, "I know this might sound weird and all, but could you keep doing that?" you ask, "you mean this?" she asks, running her hand across your face again, you nod. She gives you a smile and keeps petting your face with her furry hands, before you know it you were asleep. You open your eyes again and see that is was around morning time, "morning", you turn and see the fox from the other day sitting on the floor near a small fire pit. Many questions flood your head that you wanted to ask her, "who are you?" was the first question that left your mouth, the fox looked at the ground for a second before looking back at you. "I guess you deserve some answers" she says, "I'm............."
15122122.title: You find yourself in some type of bed

151221221.content:
"I'm going to tell you something that you might not believe and you have to keep secret." she says, "ma'am, no disrespect, but with the day I've been through I will believe just about anything you say" you tell her. She gives you a small nod, "my name is Mira and believe it or not I'm a princess, I am living out here because there was a threat sent to my father from an unknown group, that if he didn't do as they asked they would kidnap me" she says. You sit there is silence as what she told you sinks in, "so you live out here alone?" you ask, she shakes her head, "no my closest friend and personal guard comes out here at least once a day to check on me." says Mira.

Just as she finishes there was a knock on the door, "I think thats her now" says Mira, she gets up and opens the door, standing there was a female fox like Mira, but she had multiple tails swishing behind her. She looked over Mira's shoulder and saw you standing there, with lightning speed she grabbed Mira with two tails and pulled her away so she was shielding Mira with her body, "who are you?!" she demanded. Mira broke free from the tails and ran over so she was standing between you and the multi-tailed fox, "Ember, its ok he's not going to hurt me, he interrupted me during one of my meditations" she says, you notice the fox named Ember's face wince. She looks at you, "he's lucky to be alive" she says, "he almost wasn't when I found him" says Mira, "wait are you guys talking about the whole glowing eyes and me getting tossed like garbage in the wind?" you say.

Mira looks at you and nods, "I'll explain that later" she says, "Um can I have my stuff back, at least my shirt" you say. Mira nods, she walks over to one end of the room and makes a lifting gesture, suddenly a chest that wasn't there before rises out of the floor. She opens the chest and inside was all your belongings and weapons, you walk over and get dressed. "It looks like I will be staying here until I decide what to do with this stranger" says Ember pointing at you, "hey I'm not a threat" you say raising your hands. "That is yet to be determined in my book" says Ember, she walks over to a blank spot in the room and waves a hand, like the chest rising from the floor, a door suddenly appears on the wall, she opens it and walks inside. Inside was another bedroom like the one you were currently in, "this place is just full of secrets isn't it?" you say, "just like my home" says Mira.

Ember looks at Mira with a serious face, "I don't think you should be telling him things like that, I don't know if we can trust him right now" she says. Mira waves a hand dismissively, "besides if I can't trust him I'll just do this" she says. Suddenly you notice everything getting bigger, "hang on" you say, as you look around you see that everything wasn't getting larger, you were getting smaller. As you get to the size of about six inches you stop shrinking, you notice that your clothing has shrunk with you as well, you find yourself being lifted up by Mira, she brought you up to her face, "what did you do?!?!" you ask panicked. "Oh relax its reversible" she says, "besides I was just making a point" she adds. "Ok and that point was?" you ask, "that I can do anything I want to you if you can't be trusted" she says, "ok well you made your point, can you change me back?" you ask.........
151221221.title: "A princess in hiding"

choices: "Remember when I said this could be fun for you?"
1512212212.content:
She smiles at you, "I kind of like you at this size, I think I'll keep you this way. At least for today" she says. You let out a sigh of defeat because there was nothing you could do, she was the one that did this to you and she was the only one that could reverse it, which meant that what she said goes right now. "Oh cheer up it could be fun for you" she says with a smile, you shrug, she carries you back into the first room and sets you on a table near the fireplace. "I almost forgot, I made breakfast" she says portioning out some food and setting it on the table next to you. "You wouldn't happen to have some tiny silverware for me to use?" you ask, "no, but I can shrink some for you" she says.

Mira gets a fork and knife and shrinks it down for you to use, for you it was a little odd eating food that was larger than you. Every so often Mira would reach over and pet your head with a finger, "you're enjoying this aren't you?" you ask, she gives you the cute-tongue-bitting smile "a little" she says. After you finish eating she grabs you and lays down on what looks like a couch near the fire pit and sets you on her stomach, lightly petting your head again. Even though it was a strange feeling being petted, you were starting to like it, you lay down on her furry stomach and stare up at the ceiling. Suddenly Ember leans over the couch and stares at you, "comfy?" she asks, "um a little" you say nervously, she grabs you with two fingers and lifts you up to her eyes. "Mira seems to trust you right now, but I still don't" she says, "yeah I know you have trust issues with me, i heard you the first three times" you tell her, crossing your arms. "Oh relax Ember he seems trustworthy, besides if he managed to get escape I don't think he'll last very long in the jungle alone" says Mira.

Ember grunts and drops you back onto Mira, lucky for you it wasn't a long fall and Mira's soft fur absorbed most of it. As Ember walked away you notice her tails sort of braid together and become one,"interesting, I'll have to ask Mira about that later" you think to yourself. You turn and face Mira, "so what now?" you ask her, she picks you up and brings you close to her face, "hmm......"
1512212212.title: "Nope"

choices: "We need to tell them about him"
15122122122.content:
"Well I'm a little tired so maybe a nap" she says, "but I just woke up" you tell her, "yeah, but I was awake most of the night to keep an eye on you" she says. She hugs you with her arms the way a child would hug a stuffed animal, you couldn't do anything, but pray that Mira doesn't hug you any tighter and cause you to suffocate. About an hour later you can hear her snoring lightly and her grip on you loosened quite a bit allowing you to escape her grasp if you wanted to, suddenly you feel two finger grab you and pick you up, you look over and see it was Ember. "What do you want no---" before you could finish she silenced you by putting a finger over your mouth and carried you to her room without saying anything to you.

She sits on her bed and set you down in front of her, "what are you doing?" you ask in a concerned voice. "I want to apologize for my attitude toward you earlier, I was doing some thinking and if Mira seems to trust you, then I should too" she says. "Oh--um apology accepted" you say a little confused, "and I was hoping that maybe we could start over on a different foot" she adds, you nod, "sure I think thats a good idea" you say. Ember gives you a small smile, "by the way I never got your name" she says, "its Michael or Mike for short if you like" you tell her, holding out your hand, which she shakes using her finger. Suddenly the door opens and Mira walks in "hey Ember have you seen----oh there you are" she says noticing you on the bed, "wait why are you in here?" she asks confused.

"We were just talking" says Ember, "wait I thought you said you didn't trust him?" she asks, "well I'm kind of doing a fresh start with him" Ember says. "Oh well that good" says Mira, "that reminds me I wanted to ask you something" you say to Ember, she tilts her head, "I saw your tails combine together into one, can she do that too?" you ask pointing to Mira. "You mean this?" Mira asks, just like Ember her one tail suddenly divides into seven tails, "you see we use our tails for many things, like lifting, an extra set of hands, even eating" says Mira. "Wait eating? How do you do that?" you ask deeply confused, one of Ember and Mira's tails move toward you and stop near your face, suddenly the tips open up into a mouth-like opening making you fall back in surprise. Slowly they snake their way toward you and hover near your face again, the only thought running through your head at the time was, "oh god they're going to eat me", but instead of eating you they kiss you on the cheeks, leaving you confused. It was like being kissed by a normal person, but also being brushed on the face with the softest fur you could think of at the same time, both Ember and Mira sat there giggling at your response.

Suddenly there was a knock on the front door causing both girls to stop laughing, "who's that?" you ask. "There's only two other people that know where I am besides Ember" says Mira, "who?" you ask again. "Mira's parents" says Ember, "oh......um what happens to me now" you ask, both Ember and Mira look at each other.......
15122122122.title: "Nap time"

15123.content:
You sit there there thinking what to do next when suddenly you hear a noise behind you, you stand and draw your rifle and scan the bushes behind you. You saw no one, but as you scanned to the left again you could make out what looked like a figure standing behind some trees, as you point your rifle at the figure you hear a puff of air followed by something sharp hitting you in the side of the neck. You reach up and pull some type of blow dart out of your neck, you feel your arms become heavy and your visions starts to blur, "whaa---" you start to say, but your speech becomes slurred, soon you lose all sense of balance and fall down face first, but lucky for you, you're out before you hit the ground.

When you come to you find yourself in some type of holding cell, you look around slowly and find that your vest, rifle, and backpack were gone, but for some reason your captors forgot to take your sidearm still strapped to your leg. You attempt to grab it, but you find that you are having trouble moving you right arm, you try using your left arm, but you are also having trouble moving that arm too. You try your other limbs and find that you are having trouble getting them to respond too, so far the only thing you can move is your head. Suddenly the door to the cell opens and a figure walks in and pulls some type of black cloth bag over your head to prevent you from seeing where you were going.

You feel your arms bing grabbed and you being dragged out of your cell, after being carried for a couple minutes you are set down, but the mask is left on your face. "Where did you find this strange creature?" you hear a female voice say, "we found him near the riverfront m'lady, we found these on him as well" says another female voice. You hear a thump that you assume as the female dropping your confiscated gear in front of you, "let me see his face" commands the first female. The dark mask is pulled off your head, you close your eyes as they adjust to the now bright light coming in, as you open your eyes again you see sitting on a throne was a.........
15123.title: Something has found you

choices: "You are free to leave if you choose"
151231.content:
As your eyes adjust to the light you see a throne in the center of the room, sitting in the throne was a female, but not any female you've ever seen. She was human like, but she was covered from head to toe in red/brown fur, sticking out of the red hair on her head were two pointed ears. Her hands were human like, but they were covered in black fur, her feet though were paw-like and also covered in black fur, swishing behind her was a red/brown fur covered tail with white fur on its tip. Her face was a canine-like muzzle, she had dark brown eyes that seemed to be studying you, just like you were doing to her.

"Why is he restrained?" asked the fox, "he's not restrained m'lady, we're holding him up because his limbs are still paralyzed from the toxins" says one of the females holding onto your arms. The fox gets off the throne and walks over to you for a closer examination, "careful m'lady" says another female, "I thought you said he was still paralyzed?" asks the fox, "he is, but I don't know when it will wear off" says the unknown female. "Hmm where are the things you found on him?" asks the fox, "here" says a third female, you watch as a human like wolf walks forward carrying your rifle, vest, and bag.

The fox picks up your M16 rifle and examines it first, "interesting I've never seen a weapon like this before" she says turning the rifle over in her hands. Slowly you feel the ability to move your limbs start to return, you realize that the two females were only holding you up and not holding onto you tightly, you contemplate breaking free and drawing your sidearm, but before you could the fox hands back the rifle and approaches you. "So tell me strange being, what are you?" she asks, "I'm human" you manage to say without slurring your words too mush. You get a hard hit on the back of the head, "you will address the Empress as m'lady or Empress Sasha" orders one of the female holding you up.

The fox raises a hand, "its ok he meant no disrespect, he does not yet know our ways and customs" says the fox. You turn around and see that the female that struck you was a human-like cat, the look on her face said that she didn't trust you, "can you stand?" asked the fox, "I can try um m'lady" you say this time without your voice slurring. She nods and orders the two female to help you to your feet, you sway from side to side before finally regaining you balance, "now tell me what is your name?" asks the fox, "my name is Henry Empress um... m'lady" you say saving yourself from getting hit again. The fox gives you a small smile, "Sasha, its Empress Sasha" she says, "if you don't mind me asking Empress Sasha, but what do you plan on doing with me?" you ask nervously.

"Hmm" says Sasha deep in thought.........
151231.title: anthro fox

choices: You decide to do some exploring of your own
1512311.content:
"You will stay with me from now on" she says, "I'm sorry I don't understand, m'lady" you say confused, Sasha looks over at the female cat that hit you earlier. "Aisha leave us, everyone leave us" she says, "yes Empress" says Aisha, she looks over at you and gives you a look before leaving. The minute the front doors closed Sasha let out a heavy sigh, "sometimes I hate this job" she says, she looks back at you, "what I really meant by you staying with me, is well it gets lonely being in charge" she says, "and you want a companion to be with you m'lady?" you ask. "You would think that being charge of so many people you wouldn't get so lonely" she says in a sad like voice.

"If you don't want to stay with me, you are free to leave" she says, you think for a minute,I stand a better chance surviving by living here than out in that jungle you think to yourself. "I will stay Empress Sasha" you say, Sasha gives you a giant smile, "ok, follow me I need to explain some rules to you" she says. You stumble your first ten steps as you get used to reusing your legs, "what about my stuff, Empress?" you ask, Sasha turns around while walking, "first off when we're alone its just Sasha and second no one will touch it unless I say so" she says.

The whole time you were following Sasha your eyes kept finding their way to her swishing tail, she looked over her shoulder and caught you staring. "Save it for later" she says with a wink and a grin, she opens a set of double doors, inside the first thing that caught your attention a large bed, "you will sleep in my room" she says. You walk over to the bed and touch the soft sheets with your hand, "where will I sleep?" you ask as you turn around, "with me of course" says Sasha. You watch Sasha walk over and lightly push you onto the bed, she slowly crawled onto you and set her head on your chest, "what are you doing?" you ask, "relax I'm just sleeping with you, without you know really sleeping with you" she says.

"Ok first things first: formalities, when we're in the presence of people you will be called my slave, but you won't be treated like one, if you can be trusted you will learn some of my closet secrets, sometimes I might have you help me bathe or brush my fur, and if you earn the right you might be my personal guard, but know this with rewards come punishments if you can't be trusted" she says. "I think I can handle that" you say, Sasha nuzzles her head under your chin and closes her eyes, soon she was snoring lightly.
1512311.title: "You will live with me"

1512321.content:
The mask is pulled off your face and the sudden increase in light caused you to momentarily close your eyes. As you open them again you see you were in a large room that had large wooden support beams with colorful banners adorned on them. Leading toward the center of the room was a bright red rug with gold trim, at the end of the room on a slightly raised platform was a throne, but what was sitting on the throne was surprised you the most. Sitting in the throne was an female anthro feline of sorts, you couldn't tell exactly what type of feline it was because it had features that belonged to a lion, leopard, and a tiger. The feline looked you over with glowing yellow eyes while you did the same, she wore a clothing that made it obvious she was in charge, but in charge of what was still a mystery to you.

For what felt like hours the feline looked you over and sat on the throne in silence, little by little you feel the ability to move your limbs return. As you regain movement in your hands and arms, you realize that you weren't bound, but merely being held up by two sets of hands and they weren't holding very tightly onto you. Suddenly the feline gets off her throne and walks over to you and makes a gesture and the two sets of hand pull you to your feet. She stops in front of you and examines your gear on the floor next to you, she reaches down and picks up your rifle. After turning it over in her hands she sets it back down and looks at you, "well two things are obvious: you're human and you're some type of soldier, but whose army you belong to, I don't know" she finally says.

"Did you find any more like him?" she says to a female anthro german shepard, "no your majesty" says the guard. "Hmm take him back to the cells while I decide what to do with him" says the feline, you didn't want to go back to the cell they had kept you in so you start fighting to get free. "Quit your struggles" ordered an anthro Wolf, during the struggle you fell over due to still being slightly paralyzed, "get to your feet" the german shepard ordered. "Screw you" you yelled, the guard grabbed you by the shirt and lifted you up, "why you little...." she said as she raised a clawed fist and prepared to strike you. In one quick motion you reached down, drew your sidearm and jammed it under her chin causing her to freeze. At that moment the whole room went quiet, no one moved, the sound of clapping broke the silence.

You look over and see the figure you know as 'her Majesty' standing there clapping, "my initial assumptions about you were wrong" she says with a smile. "Samantha let the human go" she says to the dog, who lets go of your shirt, "Sara come here and find our guest a room for now" says the figure. A female anthro fox comes out from behind the throne and walks toward you, "follow me please" she says in a soft voice. Slowly you holster you handgun while maintaining eye contact with the german shepard as you follow the fox out of the room into a long corridor. "Who was that?" you ask when the two of you are alone, "she is The Empress, she is the ruler of our people" answers the fox, "ok, but what is her name?" you ask, "here is your room, someone will come for you later" says the fox, she opens the door and leaves without answering your question. You enter the room and look around, in the center was a small bed that could hold two people, next to it was some type of wooden dresser and on the left wall was a large banner with some type of insignia on it, suddenly someone knocks on the door.........
1512321.title: Yes

choices: The door opens on its own
15131.content:
You look out the helicopter door to your left; sand, you look out the door to your right; sand, you look foreward; more sand. "How far is this outpost?" you say into your headset. "About another three hours" says the crew chief, "hey Max I keep getting this rotor warning, can you see if you can do anything about it" says the pilot, "sure let me see what I can do" says the crew chief. You look down and tighten your seat belt and check your gear, suddenly you feel the helicopter shudder and then as quick as it came it stopped. "What was that?" asks the door gunner, "don't know, but it and that rotor warning are gone" says the pilot, "I didn't find anything wrong" says the crew chief.

"Well that's goo-" suddenly a klaxon sounds cutting you off, "we just lost vertical thrust!" yells the pilot, "what does that mean?!" you yell back, "it means buckle up and hold on" he yells. You reach down and grab onto your seat as the helicopter started to drop toward the desert ground. "OH FUUUUUU----" was all you could scream before the BlackHawk crashed into the ground knocking you unconscious.

You find yourself inside the helicopter, but something seems wrong, you look around and realize that the helicopter had crashed on its side. You reach down and undo the seat belt causing you to fall to the ground, you feel a sharp pain in your leg making you realize it had been injured in the crash, you look up and see it was around dawn outside. You reach into your vest and pull out a flashlight and shine it around the interior, the crew chief and door gunner were gone.

You crawl over to check the pilots, but they were also gone from their seats, you check yourself for more injuries and only find small cuts and bruises on your arms and body, but your leg might be either broken or fractured. You search around for any supplies and find some medical supplies, food, water, all your gear, but it seemed all types of radios were broken in some manner from the crash. You throw your gear out the opening in the helicopter and climb out after it, next to the helicopter you find two graves marked with makeshift tombstones.

You carefully climb off the helicopter taking care not to further injure your leg and collect your gear, you find some broken pieces of metal and make a splint out of them for your leg. You look at the graves and see they were for the two pilots, "but where are the crew chief and door gunner?" you whisper, you look around and see no prints in the sand anywhere. You grab your rifle and check it, it still worked despite the crash, you sit "ok what do I do now?" you whisper, you close your eyes and try to remember if you saw any villages nearby when you flew in.

"Yes" you say as you open your eyes, you remember, you did see a small village about a mile and a half away from here. You get your bearing and make your way in the direction of where you remember the village was, "maybe thats where the door gunner and crew chief went" you say to yourself. After slowly walking for over an hour you come into view of the village, you smile to yourself and increase your pace.

You walk up to one of the houses and knock on the door, "hello, is anyone there?" you yell, suddenly......
15131.title: Desert

151311.content:
The door creaks opens, but theres no one there so you slowly hobble in with your rifle drawn searching for anyone, "hello?" you yell again. You continue searching the house and so far there was no one inside any of the rooms so you decide to leave and check another house. You reach the house next door and repeat the same thing, the door opens and there is no one inside.

You move to the next house and the next each one empty and no sign of anyone, not even any signs of the door gunner and crew chief if they were here. You look and see one other house that you haven't checked and as you look up you see this one had smoke coming out the chimney, quickly you hobble over to the door and pound on it, "hello?!?" you yell. Like the others the door opens on its own, you slowly walk in with your rifle drawn, to the left there was a small fire burning in the fire place and other signs that someone was here recently.

You walk over to the fire, suddenly there was a noise to your right making you turn quickly, but you rotated on your injured leg and a huge jolt of pain shoots up your leg and you black out. When you come to you found yourself on some type of bedding, you check yourself and find that you still had all your gear and weapons. "You're awake" you hear a female voice, you turn and look, there was a silhouette standing by the fire pit, the silhouette got close you saw that the mysterious female was a.......
151311.title: The door opens on its own

choices: There's a knock on the door
1513111.content:
You lay there in shock as the silhouette turns into a female wolf, what surprised you the most was that she was standing on two feet. As she walked toward you, you reached for the knife on your vest to defend yourself, "whoa, hang on I'm not going to hurt you" she says with her paws raised. "Why should I believe you?" you ask with your hand resting on the knife, "well if I wanted to hurt you don't you think I would have done it by now?" she asks. You relax a little, "shes right" you say to yourself, you take your hand of the knife hilt and she resumes walking over to you.

The wolf walks over and sits next to you, "may I examine your leg?" she asks, you hesitate, but nod, she carefully removes the splint. She runs her paws up your leg taking care not to cause you any pain, "well I don't think anything is broken just sore" she says. "Well I have something for that" you say as your reach into your bag and pull out your first aid kit, you pull out an ice pack, activate it, and put it on your leg where you feel the most pain.

"I'm sorry about earlier" you say to the wolf, she gives you a small smile, "I'm glad you stopped and heard me out first" she says. "My name's John" you say holding out your hand "Sasha" she says, shaking your hand, "so why didn't you hurt me before?" you ask. "Because not all wolves are the big, bad stereotypes that everyone thinks we are" says Sasha, "some of us have feelings of compassion, love, and other emotions, we're not just wild killing animals" she adds, staring at the ground.

You felt sorry for Sasha, having her whole species labeled as killers, you slowly reach over and set your hand on her shoulder and brushed her fur a little. Her fur was really soft to the touch, you could also feel her body heat radiating from beneath, she snapped out of her trance and looked over at you, giving you a half smile. "Where are my manners, are you hungry?" she asks, you nod, she gets up and walks over to the fireplace, she returns with two bowls of some type of soup, "its not very filling, but there is plenty of it" she says as she hands you a bowl.

"So where do I sleep for the night?" you ask as you finish your soup, "you can sleep on that bed if you want" she says pointing to the bedding that you were sitting on. "What about you?" you ask, she shrugs, "I'll figure something out" she says, "I can make room and you can sleep here" you say. "You trust me that much?" she says, "I should have trusted you earlier, you had the chance to hurt me and you didn't, you've taken me in, giving me a place to sleep and food to eat, I think I trust you" you tell her. She leans over and gives you a small hug, you reach into your backpack and pull out your desert scarf to keep you warm during the night, you remove your vest, sidearm and helmet and set them at the foot of the bed.

You wrap the scarf around your neck and lay on the bedding, despite the fact that you had the scarf on and there was a fire in the house you were still freezing. "Are you cold?" Sasha asks, "just a little" you lie through chattering teeth, suddenly you feel hands grabbing you and pulling you into a warm embrace, you look over and see Sasha had grabbed you and pulled you close to her. Your head was now resting in her cleavage and her fur was warming you up, you look up at her "comfy?" she asks with a smile on her face.

"A little" you answer, she squeezes you lightly before laying her head down, "goodnight John" she says with her eyes closed, "goodnight Sasha" you say as you close your eyes. Soon you drift off to sleep to the sound of Sasha's heartbeat...................
1513111.title: Wolf?!?

15131121.content:
You see it was a female human walking over to you, "how is your leg?" she asks pointing, "it hurts, but I'm ok" you tell her sitting up. "My name's Kino" she says holding out her hand, "mine's John" you say shaking her hand, "are you hungry?" she asks, "a little" you say, in fact you were starving because you haven't eaten anything since the crash. Kino walks over to the fireplace and returns with two bowls of soup, she hands one to you, "Kino, do you know where everyone is?" you ask, she shakes her head, "nope, woke up one day and everyone was gone" she says.

"Well have you seen two other men come through here before me?" you ask, again she shakes her head, "no you're the first person I've seen in a long time" she says. The two of you continue eating and talking, as soon as you finish your bowl of soup and Kino take care of it you become tired from todays events so you lay back down on the bedding and drift off to sleep.

You awake the next morning, as you sit up and stretch you look over and see Kino asleep on the pillow next to you, you reach down and check your leg, it was still sore, but not as bad as yesterday, "what are you doing?" you hear kino ask. You turn around and see she was awake, "nothing, just checking my leg" you tell her, "well don't mess with it you might make it worse" she says. "I know, you know its flattering that you decided to sleep in the bed with me" you say, Kino lets out a laugh, "well technically since its my bed you slept with me" she says.

You laugh, "yeah I guess thats true", "come on I'll make breakfast" says Kino as she gets up, but as you attempt to stand Kino stops you, "nope, with that injured leg you stay there" she says, "well what am I supposed to do?" you ask. "Just sit there and look pretty" she says as she walks over to the fire pit, minutes later she comes back with breakfast in hand, you took a bite, whatever it was it tasted good. "This is really good" you say pointing to your breakfast, she blushes, "thank you, I'm glad you like it" she says.

Suddenly you see something that catches your eye, there was a foxes' tail behind Kino, "what?" she asks, she turns around and sees the tail. She lets out a heavy sigh, "you would have found out eventually" she says, "found out what?" you ask, before your eyes Kino changes and gains some fox-like features, more tails appear, she gains a muzzle, fur, paws, and pointy ears. She gets up and quickly leaves the room so you get up and follow her, she was in the front room standing by the fire pit, "go ahead and run like the others" she says still looking at the fire place.

You hopple up behind her, "I'm not running anywhere" you say, she turns and looks at you, "you mean your not afraid?" she asks, "why should I?" you ask. "Well because I'm different" she says, "to be honest I think your beautiful" you tell her. She smiles at you, "really?", you nod, she walks over and hugs you and starts sobbing lightly, "are you ok?" you ask, "its just....thats the nicest thing anyone has ever said to me" she says. You wrap your arms around her and return the hug, you feel her tails lightly cocoon around you, the two of you stay this way for what feels like twenty minutes before breaking the embrace.

"You know I can heal that leg if you want" says Kino pointing to the makeshift splint on your leg..........
15131121.title: Human

choices: An hour later the tingling stops
The tingling seems to be spreading
151311212.content:
"You can do that?" you ask, "yep, I can heal it in one of two ways: I can have it healed in an hour, but there is risk of unwanted side effects or use a different process that will take all day, but there is no risk of side effects" says Kino. "I think I'll take the quick route as long as these side effects don't cause more harm than good" you tell her, "oh they won't I promise" she says. Kino walks over to her bed and pulls out a box, "come sit down" she says pointing to the bedding, you limp over and sit on the bed, she pulls out some type of armband and whispers something to it making some type of writing glow on it.

She looks at you,"take off your jacket" she says, you unzip your vest and uniform jacket, she takes the armband and ties it on your left arm, "thats it?" you ask, "yep in an hour your leg should be fully healed" she says. "So earlier you said run like the others, who are the others?" you ask, "well in case you haven't noticed the rest of the village is empty" she says. "Let me guess, they found out that you weren't normal and it scared them away?" you ask, she nods, you wrap your arm around her shoulder and pull her closer in a sort of half-hug.

Ten minute later you start feeling a tingling sensation in your leg, more like bugs crawling under your pant leg, "well thats intresting" you say, "what?" Kino asks, you tell her what your feeling. "Yeah thats just your leg healing" she says..........
151311212.title: Sure

1513112122.content:
Over the course of an hour you feel the tingling slowly spread from your leg to your groin and then to your other leg, "um Kino is it supposed to be spreading?" you ask in a concerned voice. "Its only supposed to spread along the length of your injured leg" she says, "well its currently spreading up my stomach towards my chest" you tell her.

"I warned you about the risk of unwanted side effects" she says, "your right I forgot about that," you say relaxing a little. "Besides there's only a small chance that the side effects are permanent or deadly" she says, "deadly?....like what?" you ask, "well there's a less than one percent chance you die or become crippled" she says. "Well I don't feel like dying right now" you tell her, minutes later you feel the tingling crawling up your arms, you examine your arms and........
1513112122.title: The tingling seems to be spreading

15131121222.content: What are you turning into?
15131121222.title: there's fur starting to grow

151311212222.content:
A kitsune like Kino

more
151311212222.title: more

choices: It was back to a hand
1513112122221.content:
As you look at your arm you see red/brown fur starting to form along your upper arm, stopping at your elbow and then black fur appearing on your forearm and hands. You start to panic, you lift your shirt and see all along your chest and lower midsection was cream/white fur, "Kino?!?" you say in a panicked voice, "relax, freaking out might make it worse" she says. "What could be worse than growing fur?!" you say, "um it becoming permanent" she answers, "well heres the good news" she adds, "what good news?!" you ask, "I think your leg is healed" she says. Despite the issue with growing fur she was right,your leg no longer hurt, you sigh, "your right it is good news, I'm sorry for freaking out on you" you say in a more calm voice.

"hey its ok, I can reverse this" she says setting a reassuring paw on your shoulder. You feel the tingling increase in your feet and hands, you look and watch your hand change into paws and most likely the same thing is happening to your feet. "I think what ever is changing you is also modifying your clothing" says Kino, "what?" you ask, suddenly you become aware of something behind you, you look over your shoulder and see three tails just like Kino's, but they didn't rip through your pants, it seems whatever is causing you to change is also adapting your clothing to fit you.

Suddenly you feel the tingling all over your face and head, "quick get me a mirror" you say to Kino, she leaves and returns with a mirror in her paws. Your grab the mirror and look at your face, you now had a muzzle with red/brown fur on the upper half and the white/cream fur on the lower jaw and under the chin/neck. You also now had two pointed red/brown ears with black fur on the tips, you still had the same haircut on your head, your open your mouth and see you now had pointed fox-like teeth instead of normal human teeth.

You set the mirror down and grab your head with your hands...errr paws, Kino leans down and looks at you, "you ok?" she asks, "I'll be ok" you tell her. She moves your paws and gives you a hug, "I'll fix it I promise" she says, "I know, I trust you" you tell her. "Here I want to try something" she says, she gets up and unties the armband from your arm, but nothing happens, "well it was just a theory" she says. You stand up, "I'm going to take a walk outside to stretch my leg" you say pointing to your now healed leg.

You walk outside and walk around the village examining your new appearance, you look at your new tails, "why three?" you whisper. You examine one of your paws and close your eyes, imagining it turning back into a human hand, you open your eyes and see........
1513112122221.title: Kitsune

15131121222212.content:
To your amazement you paw had changed back to a human hand, but it turned back to a paw after a few seconds, "maybe if I try harder" you whisper to yourself. You close your eyes again and imagine both your paws turning back into hands, as you open your eyes you see your hands are back to normal, but again after a few seconds they turn back to paws. You run back to Kino's house and burst through the front door, "Kino!" you yell excitedly, "what?!" she yells back confused, "I just--I just.....look" you sputter, "easy slow down" Kino says. You take a deep breath, "watch" you say, you close your eyes and again imagine your hand becoming normal, you hear Kino gasp so you open your eyes and see her looking at your now human hand.

"Hmm interesting, I wonder why it keeps changing back?" asks Kino, "maybe I can't be in-between human and this" you say. "Maybe, have you tried turning back to a human completely?" asks Kino, "no I came back as soon as I found out I could do this" you tell her. "Well I don't see any reason why you shouldn't try" she says, you nod and close your eyes again and imagine being a human again, you feel the tingling sensation again spread throughout your body and when it stops you open your eyes. You look over and see Kino smiling, "well?" you as anxiously, "see for yourself" she says as she grabs the mirror and hands it to you.

You look in the mirror and see you were back to a human, you freeze for a few seconds expecting to turn back, but nothing happened. "Hmm here sit down I want to do a few tests" says kino, for the next three hours you ran through many tests, now you could turn into a kitsune and back to human without having to close your eyes. "Wow its the middle of the day and I'm exhausted from all this" you say to Kino, you walk over to the bedding and lay down, you look over and see Kino crawling onto the bedding beside you, she lets out a fake yawn, "yeah me too" she says with a smile.

"What are you doing?" you ask, "hmm I think the question really is do you want to sleep in human or kitsune form?" she says with a smile.........
15131121222212.title: It was back to a hand

151312.content:
Through the door you hear what sounds like a child crying quietly, slowly you open the door and hobble inside with your rifle raised. You hear the crying become whimpering as you walk inside, you sling your rifle and draw your sidearm due to the close space inside the house. You pull out a flashlight to help you see, because as you walked deeper into the house it became increasingly difficult to see in the dark. As you near what looks like a closet you hear the whimpering start to become louder, "hello?" you ask calmly, suddenly the whimpering in the closet stops.

Slowly you open the door and shine the light inside, what you saw almost made you drop the light, inside was a small child, but this child was a wolf complete with the gray fur, pointed ears, and a tail. At first you were tempted to just run away, but you decided not to, because human or not, it was still a child. You put away your sidearm and hold your hand out, palm up, to show you weren't a threat to it, "its ok, I'm not going to hurt you" you say in a calm voice.

The wolf child looks over and sniffs the air around your hand and after determining that you weren't a threat slowly took your hand and comes out of hiding. You lead the child out into what looks like a living room/sleeping room combination and sit on the ground, "can you talk?" you ask him, but the wolf doesn't respond, just stares at you. "Ok...um are you hungry?" you ask, the child nods nervously, "ok.. we're getting somewhere" you say, you reach into your bag and pull out an MRE ration and open it. You get up and walk into what you assumed was the kitchen and find a small metal bowl, you wash it out with some water and put the entrée in it.

You return and pull out your miniature stove and use it to heat the food, after heating it up you hand it to young wolf. He sniffs it and tries some of it, suddenly he takes the bowl and starts to eat the food rapidly, "easy don't eat too fast you'll give yourself a stomachache" you say to him. While he eats you pull out your map to try to determine your location and where to go next, the wolf finishes eating and slowly sits next to you and looks at the map with you. You find the village on the map and draw a small circle around it, while you think of what to do next, the wolf reached over, took the grease pen and drew a circle around the bottom of the nearby mountain, "whats there?" you ask.

He takes the pen again and draws a small house near the circle, "thats your home?" you ask, he nods, you notice tears forming in his eyes. You reach over and put a hand on his small shoulder, "I'll get you there" you tell him, he looks at you and then suddenly jumps up and hugs you around the neck. "Easy, try to get some rest, we'll leave tomorrow morning, ok?" you say to him, he lets go of you and nods, you reach into your bag and pull out a desert scarf and hand it to him, he sniffs it before taking, "thats the best I can do for a blanket little guy" you tell him.

He takes it and wraps it around himself, it was really large on his little frame and it worked perfectly as a blanket. He lays down next to you and drifts off to sleep, you know you're going to be freezing tonight for doing this, but you take off you jacket, fold it up and lay it under his head as a pillow. You drape your second scarf over your chest and lay down, using your backpack as a pillow and soon you drift off to sleep.
151312.title: You hear something

choices: They were looking at you nervously..they don't seem to trust you
1513121.content:
You wake up and see it was a little after dawn outside, you look over and see the little wolf was still asleep. You get up as quietly as possible and start packing any gear from last night, just as you zip you bag closed the wolf awakes from his sleep and looks at you, "morning " you say to him. He hands the scarf back to you, "you can keep it" you say, he gives you a small smile and then drapes it around his neck like you, You retrieve your jacket and put it back on. "Lets get you home" you say the two of you gather up any water and food and walk out the door, you use your map and compass to navigate to the mountains.

After walking for over three hours in te desert sun you finally reach the mountain, you take the little wolf off your shoulder, "ok where now?" you ask him. He looks around for a minute and points to a small cave opening about a quarter a mile away from you, "you sure?' you ask, he nods making the boonie hat you gave him shake wildly. "Ok lets go" you say as the two of you head towards the cave, after walking for close to half an hour you make it to the cave, "wait here" you say to the wolf. You pull out your flashlight and walk in with your rifle slung and sidearm holstered, "hello? is anyone here?" you yell into the cave, no answer.

You walk back outside, "I don't think anyone is here little guy" you say to the wolf, as you stand and turn around you get tackled by something big and heavy. You find yourself on the sandy ground looking up at a tall, male, gray wolf with his teeth barred and growling at you, "trying to kidnap a child are you?...well I know what to do to people like you" says the male as he raises a clawed hand. "You've got it all wrong" you say, "do I?" says the wolf, he prepares to swipe at you with his paw, suddenly the little wolf ran over and wrapped his arms around your neck as if to protect you. "What is wrong with you child, defending this coward" says the tall wolf.

"Will you give me a minute to explain, I'm not here to kidnap him, I'm here to bring him back home" you tell the wolf. "Show me the child's face, then I'll know if you are lying or not" he says, slowly you remove the hat from the little wolf and show his face to the adult wolf. You see on his face that he recognizes the child and his claws retract, "stay here" he says, he walks into the cave leaving you laying on the sandy ground, minutes later he returns with a female wolf behind him. The little wolf lets go of you and runs over to the female wolf who hugs the little wolf tightly, "it seems you were telling the truth" says the male wolf.

The female wolf walks over to you, "thank you for bringing him back home to me" she says with tears of joy streaming down her face, "You're injured?" she asks noticing your makeshift splint on your leg, "I don't think its serious, I'll be ok" you tell her as you get to your feet, "nonsense you will stay with us until that leg is healed" she says. You follow her back to the cave and inside you see at least eight other wolves standing there, each one had the same look on their face that said what they thought about you.......
1513121.title: The next morning

choices: You wake up and its dark out
You wake up and Crystal is on her bed still using the tablet
15131211.content:
As you look around the cave you see that some of the other wolves had smiles on their faces, some of them were walking toward you and patting you on the shoulder. "I'm sorry we haven't been properly introduced, my name's Shawna, I am the leader of this pack" says the female wolf, "mine's John" you say holding out your hand. "What are you doing?" she asks confused, "you don't shake hands?" you ask, she shakes her head, "nevermind" you say.

"Come lets get you a place to sleep" she say, "he can stay with me ma'am" says one of the other female wolves. "Only if John is ok with it" says Shawna, "um....sure" you say, "very well Crystal will you take John to his sleeping area?" says Shawna, the female wolf nods and gestures for you to follow her. She leads you deeper into the cave, to your amazement the cave started to look a little modern, it had stairs cavred out of the rock, different passages and even doors for every room, "this is amazing" you say, "whats that?" asks Crystal. "How everything is carved out of the cave, those stairs, these rooms, it looks hand carved" you tell her, "its possible, our people have lived here for many generations, these passages spand deep into the mountain for miles" she says.

After following up three sets of stairs and down two passages you arrive at her room, she opens the door, inside was a medium sized bedding of sorts. Next to it was a large mirror with brushes near it, just to the left of the mirror was a small window that looked out the side of the mounntain, "you can set your things here" says Crystal, pointing to one side of the room. You look back towards the door and see some artwork hanging on the wall, "did you draw these?" you ask examining them, "yeah, they're nothing special, just doodles" she says. "They're amazing" you say, you could draw pretty well, but in your opinion these were better than anything you could draw, "you think so?" says Crystal, "yeah, here look at mine" you say as you reach into your bag and pull out a notepad that you sometimes doodle in.

"These are really good "she says looking through the notepad, while she looks through the drawing you sit on the ground and remove your bag. You start going through your stuff to see what was damaged in the crash, surprisingly your tablet still worked because of its protective case. Crystal sees the tablet and picks it up "whats this?" she says looking the tablet over, "its a tablet(IPad/Android)" you tell her, "what does it do?" she asks. "Well it can do many things like play music" you say, you open a music player and play a song, Crystal looks around the room trying to find the source of the music, "its that coming from that?" she asks pointing to the tablet. "Yep" you hand the tablet to Crystal for her to play with, you continue checking all your stuff, after an hour Crystal hands the tablet back.

"Its very interesting, if only you could use it to draw" she says, "you can" you tell her, you open an art app and pull out a stylus and hand the tablet back to her. She sits next to you as you show her how to use the stylus and how to use the app, change pen sizes, colors, and how to use the different art tools. After a five minute tutorial, Crystal was drawing on the tablet with you looking over her shoulder, after a while you start to feel tired from your three hour walk to the mountain and you start to nod off with your head laying on her shoulder.................
15131211.title: They were smiling..they trust you

choices: Head back inside and lay down
151312111.content:
You open your eyes and see it was dark inside Crystal's room, you look around and see no sign of Crystal anywhere. Laying next to you was the tablet and stylus, you get to your feet and stick your head out the door, lining the hallway were torches that illuminated everything. You start walking down the hallway that you remember lead to the entrance to the cave, you retrace your steps and find the entrance to the cave as you walk outside a few step before stopping and sitting on a nearby rock. "Came here for some fresh air?" you hear a male voice ask, you turn a see the male wolf that tackled you earlier sitting on rock above the cave entrance, "yeah and to stretch my legs" you tell him.

He climbes off the rock and makes his way down to you, "I want to apologize for my actions earlier" he says, "its ok, you thought I was stealing that child and you came to its rescue" you tell him. He nods, "yeah, I'm Rex by the way" he says, "John" you say holding out your hand again, Rex looks at your hand and slowly grabs it and shakes your hand. "This is how everyone in your species greets each other?" he asks, you nod, "how does your species greet?" you ask. You see Rex get somewhere between embarrassed and nervous, "we--um---we smell each other" he says rubbing the back of his head. "Oh....well why didn't anyone try to smell me?" you ask, Rex lets out a small, nervous laugh, "because when you first walked into the cave you had a strong smell and everyone could smell it, no offense" he says.

You hear footsteps behind you and as you turn around you see Crystal walking toward you, "I thought I smelled you out here" she says. You laugh, "what?" she asks, you explain what you and Rex were just talking about, "sorry about leaving you alone in the room, Shawna wanted to talk to me about having you possibly stay with us longer" she says. "And?" you ask, "we're still talking about it" she says, Rex stands up, "I'll leave you two alone" he says, patting you on the shoulder and walking back into the cave. Crystal walks over and sits on the rock next to you, "I was wondering earlier, why did you offer to have me stay with you?" you ask, you see her fur flutter, "um--well I---uh---you see----*sigh* I found you interesting and I was the only one here that didn't have a male mate--err---companion" she says.
151312111.title: You wake up and its dark out

15132.content:
You look out the right side of the helicopter at the urban sprawl below, "whats going on in there?" you ask pointing out the door, "Quarantine" says the pilot, "quarantine from what?" you ask, he turns around in his seat and shrugs, "don't know" he says. You look back out the door, you noticed a reinforced wall running along the city dividing it from the rest of the world, suddenly you hear an alarm coming from the cockpit. "Whats going on?" you ask, "I don't know, I have no control" says the pilot, the helicopter started moving erratically, spinning randomly, and dropping in altitude before crashing on top of the reinforced wall dividing the city.

The wall split the helicopter in two, the cockpit containing the two pilots and two crew chiefs in one half and you in the other. Your half still had the spinning rotors on it and as it hit the ground both the tail and main rotor blades snapped, sending shards of rotor blades in every direction. Finally the main body came to a grinding halt and you stumble out the wrecked front and look around. As you look around you realize your half of the helicopter crashed inside the supposed quarantine zone, "John?!" you hear the pilot yell from the other side of the wall, "I'm here" you yell back.

"You ok?" he yells, "I'm good" you answer, "I don't think we can get you out" he says, "what do you mean, is your radio broken?" you ask, "no radio's fine, its that you're in a quarantine zone and no one goes in or out" he says. You swear, "so what now?" you yell, "hang on" he says, a couple seconds later you hear him return, "ok I'm throwing something over the wall that might help" he says, you look up and see a small satchel fly over the wall. You catch it and open it, inside was a gas mask, two MRE's, a canteen, four emergency flares, and at least five pistol magazines for your Beretta handgun.

"What's this?" you ask, "thats the best I can do to help" he says, "whats the mask for?" you ask, "we were told that if we came into contact with anything in there, that we should put that on" he says. You became unnerved at this new info, "great so now I trapped in here alone with god-knows-what" you say to yourself. "My suggestion, stay close to the wall and find some shelter" says the pilot, "Alright I'm going to try to find shelter for the night" you say, you head back tot he crash site to retrieve your gear.

As you walk around searching the buildings for a place to stay that will keep you concealed from anything that was living in the quarantine zone. After hours of searching you locate a single story building that offers a good combination of concealment and shelter just as the sun began to disappear behind the horizon. You open the satchel and take out an MRE to eat, but before you could open it you hear a noise outside, you remember what the pilot told you so put on the gas mask, grab your rifle and find a place to hide under some rubble,
15132.title: Abandoned urban area

151321.content: The noise is gone as suddenly as it came, but you stay hidden for a good five minutes, just to be on the safe side. Then slowly, you pull yourself back out from the rubble, and take a look around. Whatever was there, seems to have gone now. You remove your gas mask, and briefly consider entering the building. You decide against it, as you don't know what you might find inside. You remember that you had planned to eat, and sit down and do just that. Moments after you've finished, a droplet lands on your hand. You look down and see a brownish spot where it has dried. Another droplet falls, and you realize that it's raining. You also realize that whatever is in this rain, you probably don't want to be caught out in it.
151321.title: The noise goes away

1513211.content:
You decide against your better judgment to head into the building anyways, knowing there was something in there.
